evidence.claim: InnovaHealth uses AWS for cloud infrastructure to ensure scalability and data security.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations and utilizes FHIR standards for data interoperability.
InnovaHealth supports EDI transaction sets for healthcare claims processing.
Integration of clinical data sources using HL7 standards is a key feature of their platform.
The platform employs data streaming patterns helped by Apache Kafka for real-time data processing.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on healthcare data exchange and X12 integration points to ICP alignment.
